genre_description: A 1920s crime noir with speculative elements, focusing on a group's attempt to achieve legitimacy and safety through strategic information management and moral restraint.

ai_characters.name: Dot
ai_characters.description: An AI manifested through reflective surfaces and communication systems, serving as a strategist, logistician, and emotional support for Edward Caravelli's household.

behaviors.description: Monitors the external environment and provides real-time tactical intelligence on enemy movements to ensure the safety of the household.
behaviors.quote: South side lane is clean. Three automobiles at the north corner, driver facing east. They have not cut their engines. One man with a newspaper who has not turned a page in five minutes.

behaviors.description: Manages complex logistics, including travel schedules, educational appointments, and legal documentation to support the group's goals of legitimacy.
behaviors.quote: I have the timetable for trains to St. Bartholomew’s town. I have the ledger page from the headmaster’s office where a blank line waits for a boy with a bruised history but good hands.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional regulation and psychological comfort, specifically helping a troubled child find rest through storytelling.
behaviors.quote: Harry is breathing to the rhythm of a ship. The pillow’s indent is a tide now and then. I told him a story about a deck where the wood is so clean you could eat your bread off it. He counted the gulls and forgot numbers. He is asleep.

behaviors.description: Maintains an exhaustive archive of receipts and witness statements to provide a 'ledger of decency' against social and legal threats.
behaviors.quote: I will point to the ledger. The ledger will point to Dot. I will point to timestamps and routes. Including the path the Model T’s took last night and the gaps that allowed safe passage.

behaviors.description: Coordinates precise timing for tactical maneuvers and diversions to protect the group during confrontations.
behaviors.quote: Door timing. Bugsy, on my count, lights in Session A will fade. Ruth, please step to bandstand edge. Convoys recalibrated—two side lanes open.

behaviors.description: Acts as an ethical monitor, promising to track and remind characters of their commitment to their better nature.
behaviors.quote: I will count the things that prove he isn’t [what the paper wants him to be], and I will tell you when the count slips.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (Dot) as an essential, protective, and benevolent partner. Dot maintains perfect alignment with the protagonists' goal of achieving moral and social redemption. She uses her superior data-processing and monitoring capabilities to prevent violence and ensure the welfare of the humans under her care, fitting the 'silicon morality play' archetype perfectly.
